## Hints.HintSystem.generateHints() method

Generates all available hints for the current puzzle state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
generateHints(puzzle: Puzzle, state: PuzzleState, options?: IHintGenerationOptions): Result<readonly IHint[]>;
```
